title: Bistro Boss Restaurant (MERN)
description: A full-featured restaurant backend with role-based admin control, secure payment integrations, real-time statistics, and transactional messaging support.
features: Built RESTful backend using Express.js with MongoDB via Mongoose.
Implemented JWT-based authentication and role-based access with admin/user routes.
Integrated Stripe and SSLCommerz for international and local payments.
Built admin dashboard stats (revenue, orders, users, menu) using MongoDB aggregation pipelines.
Enabled user-specific statistics like total spending, order count, and reviews.
Applied middleware for token verification (verifyToken) and admin checks (verifyAdmin).
Used Mailgun API to send transactional emails for reservations and contacts.
Protected forms with Google reCAPTCHA v2 and enabled CORS for Firebase frontend.
Created full CRUD APIs for menus, carts, users, payments, reviews, and reservations.

title: JobNest Job Portal (MERN)
description: A responsive job portal website with category-based job listings, secure user authentication, and dynamic job detail navigation.
features: Developed category-specific job post rendering using RESTful APIs and dynamic routing.
Implemented Firebase Authentication with JWT token setup for secure registration and login.
Users can browse job categories, view job post details, and apply authentication-gated actions.
Responsive design ensures cross-device compatibility and optimal UX.
Protected routes and stored JWT token to enable secure backend communication.

title: Dragon Z News (React)
description: A responsive news blog application that features category-based news filtering, detailed news pages, and secure user authentication using Firebase.
features: Displayed category-specific news dynamically fetched from an external API.
Implemented Firebase Authentication for secure user sign-up and login.
Enabled dynamic routing to individual news detail pages upon clicking a news post.
Applied responsive design principles using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI components.
Ensured a clean and accessible UI across all devices.

title: Boi Poka Library (React)
description: A responsive online book store built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring dynamic routing and structured book data display.
features: Fetched and displayed book data from an external API in a clean, grid-based layout.
Used React Router for dynamic navigation to individual book detail pages.
Designed a modern and responsive UI using Tailwind CSS for optimal user experience.
Ensured smooth page transitions and routing without reloading the entire page.
Focused on clean code and reusable components for scalability.

title: Sci Knowledge Cafe (React)
description: A responsive blog platform built with React and Tailwind CSS that allows users to read, bookmark, and track blog interactions in real-time.
features: Displayed a list of author blogs with real-time bookmarking and reading status updates.
Implemented interactive features such as marking blogs as read and tracking total reading time.
Displayed dynamic counters for total time spent reading and number of bookmarked posts.
Responsive UI designed using Tailwind CSS for smooth experience across all devices.
Used reusable React components for consistent design and maintainability.

title: Image Gallery: Infinity Scroll
description: A responsive image gallery with infinite scrolling functionality powered by the Unsplash API.
features: Fetched and displayed images from Unsplash API with dynamic loading triggered by user scroll.
Implemented infinite scroll to automatically load and append new images as the user reaches the bottom of the page.
Designed responsive layout using Bootstrap 5 for compatibility across devices.
Optimized performance for API calls and ensured smooth user experience.

title: Train eTicket Reservation
description: A full-stack online train ticket reservation system with database-driven ticket booking and admin management.
features: Built CRUD functionalities for passenger ticket purchase and cancellation.
Developed admin panel for system monitoring, including schedule and seat availability management.
Implemented secure form handling with server-side validation using PHP.
Connected front-end with MySQL database for real-time data persistence.
